channel.title: U Torrent~Question (help)
channel.description:
Is anybody good with U-torrent that can help me?
Ok I ran my Server on port 43594
I then went on U-Torrent and did everything on the guide >Preferences>Tick those 3 boxes except randomize Port>43594 in the port box>apply>ok.
It closes then at the bottem it says [u][b]Listen Error, you should change the Listen port?[/b][/u] meaning I have 2 programs running through the same Port (43594)
[b]Is this meant to happen? Can players still connect through me server if this is occuring?[/b]

item.title: U Torrent~Question (help)
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

Is anybody good with U-torrent that can help me?

Ok I ran my Server on port 43594

I then went on U-Torrent and did everything on the guide >Preferences>Tick those 3 boxes except randomize Port>43594 in the port box>apply>ok.

It closes then at the bottem it says Listen Error, you should change the Listen port? meaning I have 2 programs running through the same Port (43594)

Is this meant to happen? Can players still connect through me server if this is occuring?

Read full topic
